Package co.cask.cdap.api.metrics

Defines a way to collect user-defined metrics.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Metrics
    Defines a way to collect user-defined metrics.
    MetricsCollectionService
    Service for collects and publishes metrics.
    MetricsCollector
    Collects metrics.
    MetricsContext
    A context of metrics collection.
    MetricStore
    Stores and provides access to metrics data.
    RuntimeMetrics
    Provides access to metrics about running processors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MetricDataQuery
    Defines a query to perform on MetricStore data.
    MetricDeleteQuery
    Query that specifies parameters to delete entries from MetricStore.
    MetricSearchQuery
    Defines a query to perform Exploration and Search on MetricStore data.
    MetricTimeSeries
    Represents a single time series defined by a metric name and set of tag values.
    MetricValue
    Carries the "raw" emitted metric data point: metric name, type, and value
    MetricValues
    Carries the "raw" emitted metric data points: context, timestamp, collection of MetricValue
    NoopMetricsContext
    A no-op implementation of MetricsContext.
    TagValue
    Represents tag and its value associated with MetricValues.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MetricType
    MetricType - COUNTER or GAUGE type

Package co.cask.cdap.api.metrics Description

Defines a way to collect user-defined metrics.
